movie.title: Extraordinary Tales
movie.description_intro: An animated anthology of five tales adapted from Edgar Allan Poe's stories.
movie.description_full: An animated anthology of five tales adapted from Edgar Allan Poe's stories.

movies.title: Wazir
movies.summary: 'Wazir' is a tale of two unlikely friends, a wheelchair-bound chess grandmaster and a brave ATS officer. Brought together by grief and a strange twist of fate, the two men decide to help each other win the biggest games of their lives. But there's a mysterious, dangerous opponent lurking in the shadows, who is all set to checkmate them.
movies.description_full: 'Wazir' is a tale of two unlikely friends, a wheelchair-bound chess grandmaster and a brave ATS officer. But there's a mysterious, dangerous opponent lurking in the shadows, who is all set to checkmate them.

movies.title: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
movies.summary: The popular cartoon cat and mouse are thrown into a feature film. The story has the twosome trying to help an orphan girl who is being berated and exploited by a greedy guardian.
movies.description_full: The popular cartoon cat and mouse are thrown into a feature film. The story has the twosome trying to help an orphan girl who is being berated and exploited by a greedy guardian.

movies.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
movies.summary: When a full-scale war is engaged by the evil Scarran Empire, the Peacekeeper Alliance has but one hope: reassemble human astronaut John Crichton, once sucked into the Peacekeeper galaxy through a wormhole. Crichton's task: Get the entire Peacekeeper race to safety before the last war of an era brings and end to the universe.

movies.title: Confirmation
movies.summary: Judge Clarence Thomas' nomination to the United States Supreme Court is called into question when Anita Hill, a former colleague, testifies that he sexually harassed her.
